entry.title: What Makes Purview Genesis Group Stand Out
entry.content:
Thanks for stopping by our blog. If you’re looking for more information about Purview Genesis Group, you’ve come to the right place.

About Purview Genesis Group

We are a group of companies with a diverse portfolio that includes real estate development, international trade, immigration consultancy, interior design, and industrial catering. Our company has been in operations since 1986.

We employ over a hundred and fifty employees spread across our headquarters in Dhaka, Bangladesh, and our offices in Mississauga, ON, and Virginia/ Washington DC.

Our team serves clients in Bangladesh, the Middle East, the United Kingdom, the European Union, and all over the USA and Canada.

The Purview Genesis Group Difference

One aspect that makes us second to none is our exemplary track record for quality, dependability, and sincerity of purpose. 

What also sets us apart is that we use long-drawn-up strategies to add value to the supply chain of our partners. In addition, we have an excellent human resource policy which includes providing staff with bonuses and financial assistance for medical treatments. Our compassionate approach enhances our success story.

One of our most significant achievements has been growing our business consistently for the past thirty-five years and earning customer appreciation. 

Our dream for the future is to bring in more customers and expand by changing with new technologies. We also aim to continue to follow the principles that brought us success, including trust, fidelity, and innovation. 

While we are passionate about what we do, we also care about protecting the environment and maintaining a green policy.

We even believe in giving back to society, and as part of that belief, we participate in CSR. 

To learn more about all that we do at Purview Genesis Group, please click here. If you have any questions about how we can help you, we’d love to hear from you. Please get in touch with us here.

entry.title: Bangladeshi jute goods, handicrafts win hearts at fair in China
entry.content:
Bangladeshi jute goods and handicrafts have attracted the attention of the visitors at an exhibition in China titled "2021 Euro-Asia Economic Forum Economic and Trade Cooperation Expo and China (Shaanxi) Import and Export Commodities Exhibition".

Different handicrafts, bag, basket, gift items and ornaments made with jute were showcased at the fair by China-based Bangladeshi company Yiwu Yiou Export and Import Company Limited.

entry.title: Xiaomi opens local assembly plant in Gazipur
entry.content:
Smartphone giant Xiaomi began assembling mobile phones in Bangladesh on Thursday at its Gazipur factory.

The factory was set up with $10 million in Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) under the "Made in Bangladesh" scheme.

The factory will assemble 3 million units of smartphones annually.
